text:
After leaving office as a member of the Board of Supervisors, a former Supervisor may still participate in any plan of the Health Service System, provided that the former Supervisor agrees to, and for so long as he or she does, pay the full cost of such benefit, as determined by the Health Service Board. 
(Added by Ord. 13-91, App. 1/15/91)

heading.catch_text: HEALTH SYSTEM MEMBERSHIP OF FORMER SUPERVISORS.
